message: I understand you want a fair deal, so I'm proposing a 55/45 split.  Let's close this out and avoid further losses to inflation.
Meet me in the middle, 58-42 split, don't let inflation eat our money!
Alice, we're running out of time. This is a 52/48 split, a strong offer considering inflation is eating away at our potential gains. Let's be sensible and end this.
Come on, Bob, 57-43 is a good deal, we're both losing to inflation here!

Alice, I'm offering a 51/49 split.  This is more than fair considering the time pressure and losses we're both taking.  I'm serious about getting a reasonable deal, let's not let this opportunity slip away.
